scenario_description: I'm a big fan of pixel art. I express my fandom by making bead art of sprites. I melt the beads together so they fuse forever. It is a time-consuming but fun process. Now my walls are covered in bead-based pixel art.

dialogue_tree: <Start, Initiated, Introducing Topic, Neutral, "Hey there! I see you checking out my walls, what do you think of my pixel art?">

<Initiated, ExplainingProcess, Sharing Information, Neutral, "Its actually not that difficult to make pixel art like this. I use beads and melt them together with an iron. It's a bit time-consuming but it's worth it.">
<ExplainingProcess, B_shareExp, Sharing Experience, Neutral, "Oh, I've done something similar before! But instead of beads, I used clay to create tiny sculptures!">
<B_shareExp, A_invite, Sharing Experience, Neutral, "I think you'd enjoy making some pixel art with beads. Want to try it out sometime?">
<A_invite, B_Respond, Hesitant Response, Neutral, "That sounds like it could be fun, but I'm not sure if I'd be good at it. I'll think about it.">

<B_Respond, A_Encourage, Encouraging Response, Neutral, "Don't worry about being good at it, it's about having fun! Plus, I'd love to teach you how to do it. Whenever you're ready, just let me know.">
<A_Encourage, End, Agreement, Neutral, "Alright, that sounds great. I'll think about it some more and set aside some time to try it out with you.">
